author: LastWordKinsley

text: [Imagery] The knights strapped them selves into their armor. The latches clamping shut with a "clang" as they handed each other their swords and shields. The look in their eyes easily spelled fear. But they gathered in formation regardless of this. The tower guard cried out, "Th... they're blasting down the front gate!!!". As the men and women rose to their feet, with honor draped across their backs. Their metal armor clanking as the commander shouted, "ONWARD, FOR GLORY!!! Only the bellowing of fire upon the outer gate could be heard, along with the screeching of the terrible creatures! The gates came crashing down with wisps of fire! Massive slithering creatures, their wings flapping only encouraging the fires! The knights gripped their shields, "FOR HUMAN KIND, SLAY THESE FOWL BEASTS!!!"

text:
Nah, Screech's Sprint isn't nearly as bad as long as you're good at controlling Squawks. The first half is hard, before the race itself, but it's also pretty short.

Chain Link Chamber on the other hand, is way too long, has a checkpoint barrel in a spot you could very conceivably miss, and is based entirely around the finicky-ass climbing controls  :P
